Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:x( SCREEN_CENTER_X-215 ) self:y( SCREEN_CENTER_Y-235 ) self:vertalign('top') self:zoom(0.6); self:shadowlength(2); end

Layer.Text: Choose a profile you wish to delete its data.
Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:x( SCREEN_CENTER_X+300 ) self:y( SCREEN_CENTER_Y-235 ) self:vertalign('top') self:horizalign('right') self:zoom(0.4); self:shadowlength(2); end

Layer.Text: Deleting the profile data will also delete Nonstop data.
Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:x( SCREEN_CENTER_X+300 ) self:y( SCREEN_CENTER_Y-225 ) self:vertalign('top') self:horizalign('right') self:zoom(0.4); self:shadowlength(2); self:diffuseshift() self:effectcolor1(1,0,0,1) self:effectcolor2(1,1,1,1) self:effectperiod(2) self:shadowlength(2); end
